      • parse

        public Stock parse(java.math.BigInteger stckID,

                   int quantity,
                   java.math.BigInteger storeID,
                   java.lang.Float salePercetage)
            throws java.lang.Exception

        Function to create new stock object according data received from DB

        Parameters:
        stckID - - parameter for stckID field in object
        prdID - - parameter for prdID field in object
        name - - parameter for name field in object
        type - - parameter for type field in object
        price - - parameter for price field in object
        color - - parameter for color field in object
        inCatalog - - parameter for inCatalog field in object
        imageURL - - parameter for imageURL field in object
        quantity - - parameter for quantity field in object
        storeID - - parameter for storeID field in object
        salePercetage - - parameter for salePercetage field in object
        Returns:
        new created stock object with data from DB
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • add

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> add(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ParentController
        Will add the object to the DataBase
        Specified by:
        add in class ParentController
        Parameters:
        arr - always will contain 2 Objects: The first one (get(0)) is the Object to add to the DataBase (Depend on the Controller) The second one (get(1)) is Boolean that indicates if we want to get the new Object's id
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the answer: if the Boolean=true, will contain the BigInteger id else, will contain true
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
